properties.areaDesc: Treasure; Northeastern Yellowstone; Musselshell; Northern Rosebud
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 8 at 2:05AM MST until February 9 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches,
greatest north of Forsyth.

* WHERE...Musselshell, Treasure, Northern Rosebud and
Northeastern Yellowstone.

* WHEN...From 5 AM early this morning to 2 AM MST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions due to snow and
poor visibility. Localized blowing snow could reduce visibility
at times.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be a break in the snowfall this
afternoon. Snow will develop again by early evening.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 2 AM MST SUNDAY
